welcome_message_body: Welcome to Langsa, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Mitana Cafe (Mie Wak Hasan)
restaurants.description: Mitana Cafe (Mie Wak Hasan) is a noodle restaurant located in Langsa.
restaurants.address: Achmat Yani street, Langsa, Nanggroe Aceh Darrussalam
